hopobject.name: Page
hopobject.body: I'm on holiday ipratropium bromide drugs.com David, a short-term foster child, was eight when he arrived, but after a few months it began to be clear that he couldn’t go home. ‘I was told if I didn’t keep him he’d go to a children’s home, and I couldn’t let that happen.’ Alex says. David was fostered long-term and ended up staying for 10 years as a de facto family member. He now runs a window-cleaning business, and visits every fortnight with his two children, who call Alex ‘Granny Alex’.
